name: Bacta Infirmary
Lore: 'Medical wonder invented centuries ago by the Vratix insectoid species. Gelatinous red bacta is suspended in a synthetic solution to create a healing bacterial medium.',
Text: 'If Center of Tyranny on Table, deploy on table. Insurrection is lost. Rogue Squadron pilots of ability < 3 are forfeit +1 and if lost from table, may be placed here. During your control phase may use 2 force to take a character here into hand. (Immune to Alter.)',
